experiences.title: Software Developer
points: Developed software fixes and ehnancements to an electronic medical record system to ensure reliability and efficient workflows for clincians at large scale health systems across the US
Managed interdisciplinary project teams to unify high-impact workflows between procedural applications and reduce the cost of maintaining critical specialties
Guided research and development for Interventional Radiology by meeting with clinicians and advocating for new workflows to support better patient outcomes
hiddenPoints: Facilitated a transition from SVN to Git source control for a team of 40 developers by providing troubleshooting help and creating scripts to automate common commands
Reviewed over 250 changes of a large, shared codebase to provide feedback on technical designs and contributions from developers across application teams

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
points: Simplified troubleshooting of medication dispensing cart errors for large medical organizations by preventing data corruption from electrical interference
Created quality standards for software used by two embedded medical device systems by evaluating product requirements and building automated product verification tests

experiences.title: Optometric Technician
points: Completed preliminary visual acuity and eye health testing for patients by collaborating with a team of patient care professionals
Managed sensitive health information for all patients seen by adhering to HIPAA procedures and security guidelines
Supported optometrists conducting comprehensive medical eye exams for several patients daily by preparing and cleaning equipment

experiences.title: Paint Line Operator
points: Consulted with management and engineers to ensure strict quality guidelines and efficiency in the production process
Completed logistical and strategic operations to provide components to assembly line workers during second shift
